learning_objectives.description: The importance of cash and of cash-flow forecasting: Why cash is important to a business; What a cash-flow forecast is, how a simple one is constructed and the importance of it; Amend or complete a simple cash-flow forecast; How to interpret a simple cash-flow forecast; How a short-term cash-flow problem might be overcome, e.g. overdraft, delaying supplier payments, asking debtors to pay more quickly
Working capital: The concept and importance of working capital
